name: truenorth-advocates-enhanced-lambda
description: Enhanced Lambda backend for True North Advocates with full security and compliance features

scripts.deploy: zip -r function.zip . && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name tna-backend --zip-file fileb://function.zip
scripts.create-layer: mkdir -p nodejs && cp package*.json nodejs/ && cd nodejs && npm ci --production && cd .. && zip -r layer.zip nodejs
